snippet: Iran’s claim to have not only replicated but test-flown its version of a sophisticated bat-winged American spy drone captured in late 2011 is a gross exaggeration, the Pentagon said Wednesday.
abstract: Pentagon plays down Iran's assertion that it replicated and tested sophisticated bat-winged American spy drone captured there in 2011, calling such claims gross exaggeration.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s claim to have not only replicated but test-flown its version of a sophisticated bat-winged American spy drone captured in late 2011 is a gross exaggeration, the Pentagon said Wednesday.

headline.main: Iran: Pentagon Rebuts Claim on Drone
headline.print_headline: Iran: Pentagon Rebuts Claim on Drone

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
